lead_paragraph: An affiliate of Brookfield Asset Management got court approval to buy Atlantic City, New Jersey's shuttered Revel Casino Hotel for $110 million in cash on Tuesday after a judge rejected complaints the auction for the bankrupt complex was tainted.

headline.main: Brookfield Gets Court OK to Buy Atlantic City's Revel Casino
headline.print_headline: Brookfield Gets Court OK to Buy Atlantic City's Revel Casino
